title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Total number of employees, with a total of 12 data points.
Overall Total number of employees has increased over the Year.
Total number of employees is roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, gradually increasing from 2009 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2015, and lastly slightly increasing from 2015 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
Max Total number of employees about 156000.0 was recorded at Year 2019
Min Total number of employees about 77087.0 was recorded at Year 2008
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Total number of employees, with a total of 12 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly increasing which exists from 2008 to 2016.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2016 to 2019.
